subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Thomas Voeckler staged a short solo break on the uphill finish for a victory in the Grand Prix Cycliste de Quebec, disappointing fans of Ryder Hesjedal, a Canadian who finished seventh in this year’s Tour de France.
snippet: Thomas Voeckler staged a short solo break on the uphill finish for a victory in the Grand Prix Cycliste de Quebec, disappointing fans of Ryder Hesjedal, a Canadian who finished seventh in this year’s Tour de France.
